Articles.Content:
I was playing KSP when I started thinking about my first time on the Forums. I was a long time Lurker, and I had finally had the courage to post.

**My first post** 

> 
> Today I crashed 17 planes' date=' landed on the [u']mum once, and set a satellite around Duna. 
> Normal Day:cool:

Then, my first thread was this:

[**Best Achievements**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84356-Best-Achievements)

My question is, What was your first Thread?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-29T10:05:04Z" title="03/29/2015 10:05  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 29, 2015</time> by Teoman2**

My first thread asked how often KSP went on sale.

I was cheap as heck... just kidding, I had $24 in my Steam Wallet and didn't want to buy any more to get to KSP's $27 ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

But I was still cheap.

My first thread was ['Anybody care for some asparagus?](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107586-Anybody-care-for-some-asparagus)'

I still don't start very many threads, but I post a lot.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Happy landings!

I had a question about the [maximum machine specs](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55823-Maximum-Machine-specs), like at what point will upgrading your pc not help because of unity limitations.

I signed up on these forums just so I could ask a question on how to install mods, more specifically KSP Interstellar. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Now look at me!

[My first thread was an introduction](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43531-Greetings-fellow-Kerbonauts%21). It seems like I haven't changed too much ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Except my username of course, but Maximus97 is soooo much better.

None of the above. My first post/thread was to [report an error and make a suggestion](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99291-Fuel-flow-rate-for-jet-engines-incorrect?p=1524910#post1524910) in the "Suggestions and Development Discussion" forum. Since the post included some "Sciency Stuff", I've selected the second option in your poll.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-30T00:36:29Z" title="03/30/2015 12:36  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 30, 2015</time> by OhioBob**

This was my first post and first thread: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112859-HOPPER-%28High-occupancy-para-planetary-exploration-rover%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112859-HOPPER-%28High-occupancy-para-planetary-exploration-rover%29)

My first one was when I saw a ejector seat in ksp and tried to re make it XD I was such a noob dint even know how to post a screen shot of it so I used the one I'd coppyed to make mine and posted that
my first thread was used to advertise a WIP mod. Now it turned into a journal.

> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/45127-Mod-Stock-Craft-ShowRoom-by-WinkAllKerb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/45127-Mod-Stock-Craft-ShowRoom-by-WinkAllKerb)

Might be that ; )

Mine was (no surprise) me [sharing my first KSP video](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53689-Burn-Kerbal-Music-Video?) with everyone.

I can't believe that was so long ago now. Wow.

(Very) Long time lurker here.

(more than 2 years, Whoo!)

My first thread was:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/23092-KSA-Intrepid-0-17-MODS-STOCK](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/23092-KSA-Intrepid-0-17-MODS-STOCK)

Long time ago...

Mine was a question over if it was possible to [Save file edit a ship in space back into the VAB](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28781-Save-file-editing-a-ship-in-space-back-to-the-VAB).

My first post (on this post Great Forum Glitch account) was

> 
> Shouldn't that be a kraken, rather than a beast?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-30T02:22:05Z" title="03/30/2015 02:22  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 30, 2015</time> by Tw1**

> 
> Mine was (no surprise) me [sharing my first KSP video](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53689-Burn-Kerbal-Music-Video?) with everyone.
> I can't believe that was so long ago now. Wow.

Dude! I didn't know that was your first vid!

I had just installed NovaPunch for aesthetics and got a little confused about the fairings.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/11727-NovaPunch-I-don-t-have-any-2-metre-fairing-plates](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/11727-NovaPunch-I-don-t-have-any-2-metre-fairing-plates)
A game feature idea.
According to the search my first one was a [HelloWorld-Thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/6677-Hello)

I remember that my first thread reply was a showcase of a single-launch space station in "Showoff your Rep-worthy crafts".

Aahh.. the days when I didn't have an avatar.

Mine was in the science labs asking about black holes and the speed of light, so i don't know what category of the poll that goes in. To be honest, I spend way more time in the science labs and space lounge than talking about ksp ;-;
